name: Animal Soul
text: Your close bond with an animal allows you to ignore harmful magic that cannot affect your wild side.
prerequisites: Animal companion or mount class feature.
benefit: You can choose not to allow spells and effects to affect you if they would not be capable of affecting both your original creature type and the animal creature type.
text_zh: 你与自然的紧密联系让无法影响你自然面的有害魔法被你忽略掉。
prerequisites_zh: 动物伙伴或坐骑职业能力。
benefit_zh: 如果一个法术或效果无法同时影响你原本的生物类型和动物类型，你就可以让那个法术或效果对你无效。
